name: karneval - yogi home button
description: a cute little yogi on your dashboard :3 replaces the tumblr home button on your dash [x] examples: style | with notifications

user.name: nfjk
user.about: questions, concerns, requests, or anything else can be sent to my tumblr ask and i'll reply right away. thanks!! (((i change my url a lot so if that link below doesn't work check here.)))

additional_info:
okay well, i made him kinda big so it looks like a cute little yogi is running across your post icons lol
since he's bigger than the standard home button the notification bubble pops up to the left instead of the right but i don't think that matters much!!! if you'd like you can check out out my page for other karneval styles :~)
